title: [GAMEPLAY] Snowday Malzhar backing
body: When backing with snowday Malz, his minion is a solid bright blue.

replies.body:
Hey Mostly Dark Link - 

Thanks for the report! I'll take a look at this in the morning and see what's going on here.
yup the backing void poro is missing it's particles :/
Yup! We've confirmed the texture is definitely missing here. We're working to get a fix in!
